amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds by the Department of Housing and Urban Development to enforce the restriction against a veteran's preference for housing projects built on a VA campus or that use a VA-enhanced use lease.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to address HUD/VA rules regarding veterans preference on VA 202 Properties.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner (OH) amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Turner (OH) amendment (A047) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Turner (OH).
